code:
# This program creates a dictionary with the given list of keys and assigns a default value to each key

keys = ["name", "age", "location"]

# Create a dictionary with the given list of keys
my_dict = dict.fromkeys(keys, "Unknown")

# Get the value associated with the key "name"
name = my_dict.get("name")

# Print the value of "name"
print(name)
